Title: XXVII.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Brad Kane (teleplay by), Brad Kane (story by), Tyler Van Patten (story by), Marc Berzenski (staff writer), Lisa Schultz Boyd (staff writer), Joshua Rothenberger (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Captain Flint prepares for the final battle, while Billy tries to save Captain Vane from being hanged; Max must decide who she can trust; Eleanor Guthrie finds herself in charge of Nassau.
